eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Madison, KY; AT 08:50 AM ON OCT 10, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:20 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Missing 76 y/o white female, Eunice Stone, 5'1, 145 lbs., salt/pepper hair, blue eyes, glasses. Last seen leaving 565 Flint Rd in a white Jeep Patriot KY tag# 006YDH. If you see anyone fitting this description or know of her whereabouts, call (859) 624-4776 or call 911.
